borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Non-material amendment to planning permission ref: 2022/02178/FUL granted 31st October 2022 for the 'Erection of a new dormer with a door and Juliet balcony on the rear roofslope; erection of rear extension at second floor level above the back addition; installation of new rooflights and solar panels above the main flat roof at roof level and above the roof of second floor rear back addition and extension; replacement of first floor rear facing back addition window with French doors and Juliet balcony; replacement of  first floor rear facing window and replacement of all front facing windows; and installation of an air conditioning unit with an acoustic enclosure in the rear garden.' Amendments sought are to include omission of French doors and Juliet balcony and to replace with a new double-glazed sash window to the rear elevation at first floor level to match the exisitng.
